alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 03 at 4:29AM EST until March 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Blair and Bedford Counties. * WHEN...From 4 am Saturday through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. For high wind safety and preparedness information, visit weather.gov/wind. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
